video_prompt: Underwater, sunlight shimmers through a dynamic water surface, dappling on lily pad undersides and vertically swaying stems. Bubbles ascend. Aquatic plants undulate from a textured, rocky bed. Subtle currents shift hues from teal to deep blue.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Underwater perspective looking up at shimmering sunlight filtering through a freshwater pond, illuminating the undersides of vibrant green water lily pads with visible veins and their long stems. Clear blue water with subtle gradients, a rocky bed with smooth stones, and dense clusters of other aquatic plants. Include small bubbles near the surface and unique translucent bluish-white circular shapes on the foreground rocks. Serene, tranquil, and immersive, with high detail and realistic lighting, hinting at a healthy ecosystem.
refined_video_prompt: Shimmering light continuously dances and shifts across the water surface, dappling lily pad undersides. Stems gently sway upwards. Bubbles steadily ascend. Aquatic plants undulate and flow with unseen currents. Water hues subtly transition from teal to deep blue as the light alters.
